targets.query:
from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_N2" or r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_Ar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_N2" or r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_Ar")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_gastype")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_voltage")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "top_TC1" or r["_field"] == "top_TC2" or r["_field"] == "top_TC3")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /top_TC[0-9]/ or r["_field"] == "top_setpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /bot_TC[0-9]/ or r["_field"] == "bot_setpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bot_TC1" or r["_field"] == "bot_TC2" or r["_field"] == "bot_TC3")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR_array_temp[0-7]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR_array_temp[1-6]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp0" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp1" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp2" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp4" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp3" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp5" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp6" or r["_field"] == "IR_array_temp7")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IR_ref")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IR_ref")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR_array_temp[1-6]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "top_setpoint" or r["_field"] == "bot_setpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.*_PID/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * (100.0/255.0)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^(top|bot)_PID/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value*(100.0/255.0)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bot_batterylevel" or r["_field"] == "top_batterylevel")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SD_card_status" or r["_field"] == "logging_status" or r["_field"] == "bot_batwarning" or r["_field"] == "top_batwarning" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "system-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_response")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "result_code")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "gfyvrdatadash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["method"] == "GET")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "system-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "gfyvrdatadash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "system-monitoring")
  |> range(start:-8h, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "gfyvrdatadash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "sda5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["fstype"] == "ext4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/etc/hostname")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "system-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "gfyvrdatadash")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "system-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "gfyvrdatadash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "sda2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["fstype"] == "ext4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/etc/hostname")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "logs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] != "DEBUG")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "msg")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 100)
